Name: Core Passive: Barrier of Resilience
Additional Ability: Battle Spirit
Descriptions: When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Parry Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, or triggers <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> through <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, she buffs the entire team with a <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> shield equal to <color=#2BAD00>300%</color> of her base Impact + <color=#2BAD00>200</color>. The shield lasts for 90s and is equipped by the on-field character, with its value shared among the entire team. While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's Anti-Interrupt level is increased, and their ATK is increased by 40. After <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> expires, the buff remains for an additional 5s.

When there is another character in your squad who can activate <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or is from the same Faction:
When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Dead End</color>, she applies a Debuff effect to enemies within a 7m radius, increasing the damage they take from all teammates by 25% for 30s.

When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Parry Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, or triggers <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> through <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, she buffs the entire team with a <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> shield equal to <color=#2BAD00>500%</color> of her base Impact + <color=#2BAD00>400</color>. The shield lasts for 90s and is equipped by the on-field character, with its value shared among the entire team. While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's Anti-Interrupt level is increased, and their ATK is increased by 135. After <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> expires, the buff remains for an additional 5s.

When there is another character in your squad who can activate <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or is from the same Faction:
When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Dead End</color>, she applies a Debuff effect to enemies within a 7m radius, increasing the damage they take from all teammates by 25% for 30s.

When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Parry Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, or triggers <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> through <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, she buffs the entire team with a <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> shield equal to <color=#2BAD00>700%</color> of her base Impact + <color=#2BAD00>700</color>. The shield lasts for 90s and is equipped by the on-field character, with its value shared among the entire team. While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's Anti-Interrupt level is increased, and their ATK is increased by 240. After <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> expires, the buff remains for an additional 5s.

When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Dead End</color>, she applies a Debuff effect to enemies within a 7m radius, increasing the damage they take from all teammates by 25% for 30s.

The shield lasts for 90s and is equipped by the on-field character, with its value shared among the entire team. While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's Anti-Interrupt level is increased, and their ATK is increased by 400. After <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> expires, the buff remains for an additional 5s.

When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Dead End</color>, she applies a Debuff effect to enemies within a 7m radius, increasing the damage they take from all teammates by 25% for 30s.

Cons.Name: Spearhead Advance
Cons.Effect: When Caesar enters combat or switches in, she instantly buffs the entire team with a <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> shield, which can be can be triggered once every 300s. While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, enemies within a 5m radius of the shield bearer suffer a 15% Attribute DMG RES reduction.

Cons.Name: Legacy of the Far Lands
Cons.Effect: While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active during <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Barrier of Resilience</color>, Caesar's Energy Generation increases by 10%, and the shield bearer's attack boost is increased to 150% of its original value.

Cons.Name: Aries the Battering-Ram
Cons.Effect: When Caesar uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 3 additional <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color>. If her Energy is below 20, she can activate <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Point</color> instead. This substitution can only be triggered once every 5s.

Cons.Name: Overlord's Will
Cons.Effect: <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color> is guaranteed to trigger a critical hit. The skill's DMG is increased by 50% with an additional damage of 50% dealt to the primary target. When Caesar uses <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, her CRIT Rate is increased by 30% and her CRIT DMG is increased by 60% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
